reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 465/97: REGULATION UNDER SECTION 46.1 OF THE ACT (PRESCRIBED MUNICIPALITIES, DEFENCE PROPERTY)
reg_info.reg_name_text: REGULATION UNDER SECTION 46.1 OF THE ACT (PRESCRIBED MUNICIPALITIES, DEFENCE PROPERTY)

content.content: 1. The municipalities named in Column 1 of the Table to this Regulation are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 46.1 (2) of the Education Act.  O. Reg. 465/97, s. 1; O. Reg. 362/17, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The municipalities named in Column 1 of the Table to this Regulation are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 46.1 (2) of the Education Act.  O. Reg. 465/97, s. 1; O. Reg. 362/17, s. 1.

content.content:
2. The lands and premises with the assessment roll numbers set out in Column 2 of the Table to this Regulation are prescribed for the purposes of the definition of “defence property” in subsection 46.1 (1) of the Act. O. Reg. 465/97, s. 2; O. Reg. 362/17, s. 2. TABLE Item   Column 1 Municipality   Column 2 Assessment roll number 

  1.   Town of Petawawa   47 79 078 015 44100 47 79 079 010 08400

  8.   City of Toronto   19 08 031 580 00151 O. Reg. 465/97, Table; O. Reg. 362/17, s. 3.
